title: I was Perma Banned after a single warning
body:

replies.body: I'm seeing two games' chat logs here, which would have been two different punishable instances. I'm also seeing on your account that you had previously been given a 2 week ban, which wouldn't make this a "single" warning but rather the third instance. If you don't remember why it led up to this, hit up the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the full context. I don't usually like giving our players personal chat logs here on the boards since others could take that as an opportunity to attack you for what was said.
